title.en: Bullet Top [Complete Edition] + Dead in the Morning + Wriggling Underground

altTitles.ja: 弾丸トップ〔完全版〕+朝は死んでいた+地底にうごめく

description.en:
What! Jiro Kuwata's version of Astro Boy!?
This time, Jiro Kuwata's early hero series is a bullet that can be called Kuwata's version of "Astro Boy".
It's the top!!

Horror story "I was dead in the morning"
Adventure tale "Moving underground"
First collection in book!

Synopsis
The robot “Top” is said to have the most power and a heart of justice in the world
Developer Dr. Azuma and best friend Takeshi Will they be able to work together to protect the Earth from the villains that keep appearing one after another? Kuuma Z. Satan A luminous monster that comes from distant space and possesses robots... The enemy is too powerful!

Commentary
"Dangan Top'' is a science fiction work for boys that was serialized in the monthly magazine "Bokura'' (Kodansha) for one year from the January 1958 issue.
The author is Jiro Kuwata, a genius manga artist who brought to the world such national hero works as "Phantom Detective'' and "Moonlight Mask''!
(This work is based on the aforementioned (Since the two works were serialized at the same time, it can be inferred that Jiro Kuwata had a tremendous amount of work at the time of his release.) It can also be called Kuwata's version of "Astro Boy'' due to its setting of protecting peace. I hope you enjoy the simple yet never boring story. In addition, we have also included two works that have not been made into books, "I was dead in the morning'' and ``Wriggling underground'', so don't miss them!!
